summary: The Montessori method is a unique way of teaching that focuses on a child's natural interests. It was created by Maria Montessori and is popular worldwide. In a Montessori classroom, kids learn by doing, using special materials. They can choose their activities and work at their own pace. There are no grades or tests, and teachers are trained to guide and support. This method encourages independence and real-world skills, and research shows it's effective.
title: Montessori education
